Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataManager

  • public class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class performs some useful functions: 1.Check for the availabilty of seats and return true or false to the search manager 2.Read the flights from silkair.csv and spicejet.csv 3.Write the details of booked tickets in booked.csv file

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataManager(FrsManager frs) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkAvailable(java.lang.String flightnum, java.lang.String searchDate, java.lang.String flightnum0, java.lang.String searchDate0, int s)
      This function checks for the required no.of available seats by checking for any bookings previously made for the same fight at same date
      int generatePnr()
      This function generates PNR of the tickets being booked by adding 1 to the PNR of the last booked ticket
      java.util.ArrayList<Flight> readSilkair()
      It reads data from silkair.csv and return the data
      java.util.ArrayList<Flight> readSpicejet()
      It reads data from spicejet.csv and return the data
      void writeBooking(java.lang.String name, int pnr, java.lang.String spicedate, java.lang.String spicefnum, java.lang.String silkdate, java.lang.String silkfnum, java.lang.String seats)
      This function receives the parameters and writes them to booked.csv file
